Alibaba misses revenue estimates; boosts buyback by $25 billionChina's Alibaba Group Holding on Wednesday missed analysts' estimates for third-quarter revenue, hurt by softness in the retail market and sagging economic recovery in the world's second-largest. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:34:26 GMT UDR3IBLHVNP4JMUF4DQPYVBIRA https://www.reuters.com/technology/alibaba-misses-quarterly-revenue-estimates-2024-02-07/Reuters技术
US set to overtake China as Germany's top trade partner -DIHKThe United States is set to overtake China as Germany's most important trade partner by 2025 at the latest if current trends continue, according to the head of foreign trade at the German Chamber of Industry and Commerce (DIHK). Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:11:46 GMT Y5ADQOMJ6FPAZANKQWWCHOOAOY https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-set-overtake-china-germanys-top-trade-partner-dihk-2024-02-07/Reuters市场
Petrobras in talks for projects with Gulf, Indian, Chinese firms, CEO saysBrazil's state-run Petrobras is in talks with other national oil companies in China, India and the Middle East, including Kuwait Petroleum and Qatar Energy, to collaborate on energy projects, its chief executive said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:05:21 GMT RZTJ4ZXI5VIBPDT2UI6DGZBIXI https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/petrobras-talks-projects-with-gulf-indian-chinese-firms-ceo-says-2024-02-07/Nidhi Verma商业活力

China replaces head of securities regulator amid market turmoilChina has replaced the head of its securities regulator, the official Xinhua news agency said on Wednesday, as policymakers struggle to stabilise the country's main stock indexes after a plunge to five-year lows. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:21:51 GMT YXM3PB7QT5ORJMFIAGQRH63GVM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-replaces-head-securities-regulator-amid-market-turmoil-2024-02-07/Antoni Slodkowski世界中国
Taiwan stops new group trips to China amid tourism, air route spatTaiwan's Tourism Administration on Wednesday told travel agents to stop organising new group tours to China since Beijing has yet to allow such trips to the island by Chinese tourists and has altered a flight path in the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:34:23 GMT HEQQXJQ7NZL47M76QKVTJLBEIU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-stops-new-group-trips-china-amid-tourism-air-route-spat-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
German Chancellor Scholz to travel to China in April -FAZGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz will travel to China from April 15-16, the FAZ newspaper reported on Wednesday, citing an invitation sent to business representatives by the Asia-Pacific Committee of German Business. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:10:47 GMT 3VYODXMSHBJZPCU75KF7A4O3RY https://www.reuters.com/world/german-chancellor-scholz-travel-china-april-faz-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Swiss foreign minister hopes China can 'give us a hand' in Ukraine peace talksSwiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis said on Wednesday he hoped China would "give us a hand" in Ukraine peace talks, after Switzerland last month agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:04:01 GMT YGQNKQWXABIEBP77HDDRZBXXBM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-foreign-minister-hopes-china-can-give-us-hand-ukraine-peace-talks-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
China's new energy vehicle sales drop m/m for first time since AugChina's new energy vehicle sales fell 38.8% versus the previous month, the first such drop since August 2023, industry data showed, as demand faltered in the world's largest auto market despite a renewed discounting push led by Tesla . Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:48:35 GMT JPR3EDB7SZMF5HT7SHIKEJOB7Y https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinas-new-energy-vehicle-sales-fall-388-jan-mm-first-such-drop-since-aug-2024-02-07/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Twelve rescued from rollercoaster at Hong Kong DisneylandTwelve people were rescued from a rollercoaster in Hong Kong's Disneyland after the ride stopped working on Wednesday afternoon, police and fire services said after they deployed dozens of personnel to the site. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 08:35:20 GMT 6TET3S5SCRPLRBJR2WYYTFPPQM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/twelve-trapped-rollercoaster-hong-kong-disneyland-2024-02-07/Reuters世界中国
Emerging market currencies to gain steadily in the near-term: Reuters pollMost emerging market currencies will struggle to recoup this year's losses against the dollar in coming months as expectations for aggressive rate cuts from the U.S. Federal Reserve diminish, a Reuters poll of FX strategists found. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 07:50:11 GMT 5F6S6U5NLVLWBJJCV24U6RTTLI https://www.reuters.com/markets/emerging-market-currencies-gain-steadily-near-term-2024-02-07/Devayani Sathyan, Vuyani Ndaba市场
